mapper.insert:
insert into WORKUS_CALENDAR (calendar_name, calendar_content, calendar_start_date, calendar_end_date, calendar_location, calendar_division, user_no, dept_no) values (#{calendar.name}, #{calendar.content}, #{calendar.startDate}, #{calendar.endDate}, #{calendar.location}, #{calendar.division}, 20135, 1003)
select last_insert_id()
